title: 21 featured architecture jobs in Florida
author: Nathaniel Bahadursingh
excerpt: The latest curated jobs roundup from Archinect Jobs highlights 13 architecture and design firms currently looking to grow with exciting job offerings in Miami, Tampa, Orlando, Sarasota, and other cities across Florida. For helpful guidance on how to get that next job, make sure to check out...
text: The latest curated jobs roundup from Archinect Jobs highlights 13 architecture and design firms currently looking to grow with exciting job offerings in Miami, Tampa, Orlando, Sarasota, and other cities across Florida. For helpful guidance on how to get that next job, make sure to check out Archinect's Guide to Job Titles series and our Archinect Tips collection. Raymond / Nicolas seeks an Architectural Drafter in Miami"We are seeking a highly skilled Architectural Drafter to join our growing team. The ideal candidate has 5+ years of professional drafting experience, with expert-level proficiency in AutoCAD and a strong understanding of architectural standards, building codes, and construction documentation. You’ll be working alongside our design team to produce accurate, well-coordinated, and detail-rich technical drawings for a wide range of projects." Halflants + Pichette seeks a Project Architect in Sarasota and a Project Architect in Tampa"We’re seeking a Project Architect with at least 7 years of experience to work in our Sarasota office. Ideal candidates are self-motivated, collaborative, and passionate about thoughtful design and detail execution." Qualifications include proficiency with Revit, demonstrated project management experience, and excellent written and verbal communication skills. Donnelly Condo by Halflants + Pichette. Photo: Bill SpeerFlad Architects seeks an On-site Construction Administrator in Fort Myers and a Project Manager in Tampa On-site Construction Administrator details: Qualifications include a minimum of ten years of experience working on medium-scale projects, proficiency with Microsoft Office, experience with healthcare architecture, and a deep understanding and experience with construction administration processes. Project Manager details: Qualifications include a minimum of seven years of experience and at least one year of recent project management experience with large-scale facilities, excellent client management and leadership skills, superior technical and presentation skills and a commitment to design excellence, and experience with healthcare projects. The firm is also hiring for a number of roles. Centennial Centre for Interdisciplinary Science, University of Alberta by Flad Architects.RS&H seeks a Senior Architect in Jacksonville and a Regional Healthcare Leader and Project Architect in Orlando Senior Architect details: "Have 10-years' experience, including working on parts of major projects or multiple, moderate-sized projects, providing technical guidance to entry/junior-level staff, reviewing others' work for technical accuracy, and participating in the design and implementation of new products, processes, standards, and/or operational plans that had great impact on the achievement of functional results." Regional Healthcare Leader details: "The Regional Healthcare Leader - Architecture may serve as a project/client officer/PM on larger projects and client accounts; utilization goals are 50%. The Regional Healthcare Leader - Architecture reports to the SVP, Healthcare Buildings Market Leader and is responsible for helping to grow the market segment including implementing and participating in the development of policies, procedures, and strategies." Project Architect details: "This opportunity is seeking a senior level candidate with previous PM experience to work on Aviation related projects with a focus on work at Orlando International Airport. Additional area of focus will be to aid and support across multiple projects to ensure these projects conform to the client's requirements. This position must be capable of implementing the necessary management techniques required to fulfill this responsibility for the specific project." The firm is also hiring for a Project Architect/Project Manager in Detroit and a Senior Project Manager/Project Architect in Denver. Top of the 9th by Sweet Sparkman Architecture & Interiors.Sweet Sparkman Architecture & Interiors is seeking a Project Architect in Saint Petersburg and a Project Architect in SarasotaQualifications include proficiency with Revit, Bluebeam, Microsoft Office, 3D visualization software, and Adobe Creative Suite, extensive understanding of building systems, construction materials, methods, and standards, strong time management and multitasking skills, and excellent written and verbal communication skills. Fontainebleau Development seeks an Associate - Design and Development in Aventura"The role requires strong skills in design coordination and well as basic project management experience. Applicants should have a design background (architecture or interior design) with experience coordinating across consultant types (MEP, Structural, ARCH, etc.) as well as experience in consultant contract and scope management." Studio GAIA seeks an Interior Designer in MiamiQualifications include a minimum of three years of experience in hospitality design, a high level of proficiency with AutoCAD and Microsoft Office Suite, knowledge of FF&E Specifications, strong organizational skills and attention to detail, and excellent communication and presentation skills. La Chine by Studio GAIA.Peter Pennoyer Architects seeks a Project Manager in Palm BeachQualifications include six to eight years of experience, proficient with Revit and AutoCAD, experience in private residential construction in Southeast Florida, sketching and freehand drawing skills, and strong communication skills. ALIS Architecture seeks an Interior Designer in CrestviewQualifications include a minimum of three years of experience in high-end architectural design with a focus on interiors, proficiency with Revit, the ability to produce complete construction drawing sets and high-quality models, an excellent understanding of residential construction, a proven track record of leading multiple built projects through different design stages, and strong verbal and written communication skills. Mammoth Residence by ALIS Architecture.13th Floor Investments seeks a Pre-Development Project Manager in Miami"The Project Manager will oversee projects from entitlement through pre-construction, ensuring seamless coordination among various disciplines. The ideal candidate has a strong architectural background, is highly organized, and thrives in a fast-paced, entrepreneurial environment. This role requires the ability to read and interpret plans, understand basic building systems, and manage multiple stakeholders efficiently." REPRTWAR seeks an Architectural Drafter/Designer in MiamiQualifications include a minimum of one year of experience, high proficiency with Revit BIM, knowledge of AutoCAD, Lumion, Photoshop, InDesign, and Illustrator, experience in multi-family residential, luxury homes, retail, and mixed-use projects, and strong presentation and communication skills. St. Petersburg College by WJ Architects.WJ Architects seeks a Project Manager/Project Architect in Miami, a Technical Architect - Waterproofing in Saint Petersburg, a Project Architect/Project Manager in Sarasota, and a Project Manager/Project Architect in Tampa Project Manager / Project Architect details: "We have an immediate opening for a full-time project manager with accredited architectural degree and 8 years or more of experience preferably in municipal, higher ed, educational and commercial type projects. Architectural licensure in the state of Florida is required for this position. We want someone with management ability to start and finish a project from initial client meeting through closeout and who manages multiple projects at a time. The project manager is responsible for organizing workload, project schedule and lead the Revit/BIM design documents. Strong Revit skills are required." Technical Architect - Waterproofing details: "The primary responsibility is to provide review of design and construction documents, implementation of QA/QC during construction through review of submittals, RFIs, and review/inspection/testing of ongoing work in the field. The role will include coordination/collaboration with both internal and external team members including Consultants, A/E professionals, Owners, and Contractors for successful completion of all services pertaining to the project(s) assigned." I Q T seeks an Architectural Services Position in Tampa"National building survey firm seeks reliable individuals with a background in architecture and an interest in documenting the built environment [building floor, utilities, exterior elevation & roof and section plans/models] in CAD and/or BIM. Full training on our state of the art systems is provided. Must be capable of working independently and be able to perform onsite surveys throughout the U.S. A degree in architecture is required, as is knowledge of and experience with AutoCAD and/or Revit. If you don't already, follow Archinect on Instagram, Facebook, X, Pinterest, LinkedIn, Threads, and BlueSky, as well as on our dedicated Archinect Jobs Instagram, Facebook, X, and Threads feeds.
html:
The latest curated jobs roundup from Archinect Jobs highlights 13 architecture and design firms currently looking to grow with exciting job offerings in Miami, Tampa, Orlando, Sarasota, and other cities across Florida.

For helpful guidance on how to get that next job, make sure to check out Archinect's Guide to Job Titles series and our Archinect Tips collection.

Raymond / Nicolas seeks an Architectural Drafter in Miami
"We are seeking a highly skilled Architectural Drafter to join our growing team. The ideal candidate has 5+ years of professional drafting experience, with expert-level proficiency in AutoCAD and a strong understanding of architectural standards, building codes, and construction documentation. You’ll be working alongside our design team to produce accurate, well-coordinated, and detail-rich technical drawings for a wide range of projects."

Halflants + Pichette seeks a Project Architect in Sarasota and a Project Architect in Tampa
"We’re seeking a Project Architect with at least 7 years of experience to work in our Sarasota office. Ideal candidates are self-motivated, collaborative, and passionate about thoughtful design and detail execution." Qualifications include proficiency with Revit, demonstrated project management experience, and excellent written and verbal communication skills.

Flad Architects seeks an On-site Construction Administrator in Fort Myers and a Project Manager in Tampa

On-site Construction Administrator details: Qualifications include a minimum of ten years of experience working on medium-scale projects, proficiency with Microsoft Office, experience with healthcare architecture, and a deep understanding and experience with construction administration processes.

Project Manager details: Qualifications include a minimum of seven years of experience and at least one year of recent project management experience with large-scale facilities, excellent client management and leadership skills, superior technical and presentation skills and a commitment to design excellence, and experience with healthcare projects.

The firm is also hiring for a number of roles.

RS&H seeks a Senior Architect in Jacksonville and a Regional Healthcare Leader and Project Architect in Orlando

Senior Architect details: "Have 10-years' experience, including working on parts of major projects or multiple, moderate-sized projects, providing technical guidance to entry/junior-level staff, reviewing others' work for technical accuracy, and participating in the design and implementation of new products, processes, standards, and/or operational plans that had great impact on the achievement of functional results."

Regional Healthcare Leader details: "The Regional Healthcare Leader - Architecture may serve as a project/client officer/PM on larger projects and client accounts; utilization goals are 50%. The Regional Healthcare Leader - Architecture reports to the SVP, Healthcare Buildings Market Leader and is responsible for helping to grow the market segment including implementing and participating in the development of policies, procedures, and strategies."

Project Architect details: "This opportunity is seeking a senior level candidate with previous PM experience to work on Aviation related projects with a focus on work at Orlando International Airport. Additional area of focus will be to aid and support across multiple projects to ensure these projects conform to the client's requirements. This position must be capable of implementing the necessary management techniques required to fulfill this responsibility for the specific project."

The firm is also hiring for a Project Architect/Project Manager in Detroit and a Senior Project Manager/Project Architect in Denver.

Sweet Sparkman Architecture & Interiors is seeking a Project Architect in Saint Petersburg and a Project Architect in Sarasota
Qualifications include proficiency with Revit, Bluebeam, Microsoft Office, 3D visualization software, and Adobe Creative Suite, extensive understanding of building systems, construction materials, methods, and standards, strong time management and multitasking skills, and excellent written and verbal communication skills.

Fontainebleau Development seeks an Associate - Design and Development in Aventura
"The role requires strong skills in design coordination and well as basic project management experience. Applicants should have a design background (architecture or interior design) with experience coordinating across consultant types (MEP, Structural, ARCH, etc.) as well as experience in consultant contract and scope management."

Studio GAIA seeks an Interior Designer in Miami
Qualifications include a minimum of three years of experience in hospitality design, a high level of proficiency with AutoCAD and Microsoft Office Suite, knowledge of FF&E Specifications, strong organizational skills and attention to detail, and excellent communication and presentation skills.

Peter Pennoyer Architects seeks a Project Manager in Palm Beach
Qualifications include six to eight years of experience, proficient with Revit and AutoCAD, experience in private residential construction in Southeast Florida, sketching and freehand drawing skills, and strong communication skills.

ALIS Architecture seeks an Interior Designer in Crestview
Qualifications include a minimum of three years of experience in high-end architectural design with a focus on interiors, proficiency with Revit, the ability to produce complete construction drawing sets and high-quality models, an excellent understanding of residential construction, a proven track record of leading multiple built projects through different design stages, and strong verbal and written communication skills.

13th Floor Investments seeks a Pre-Development Project Manager in Miami
"The Project Manager will oversee projects from entitlement through pre-construction, ensuring seamless coordination among various disciplines. The ideal candidate has a strong architectural background, is highly organized, and thrives in a fast-paced, entrepreneurial environment. This role requires the ability to read and interpret plans, understand basic building systems, and manage multiple stakeholders efficiently."

REPRTWAR seeks an Architectural Drafter/Designer in Miami
Qualifications include a minimum of one year of experience, high proficiency with Revit BIM, knowledge of AutoCAD, Lumion, Photoshop, InDesign, and Illustrator, experience in multi-family residential, luxury homes, retail, and mixed-use projects, and strong presentation and communication skills.

WJ Architects seeks a Project Manager/Project Architect in Miami, a Technical Architect - Waterproofing in Saint Petersburg, a Project Architect/Project Manager in Sarasota, and a Project Manager/Project Architect in Tampa

Project Manager / Project Architect details: "We have an immediate opening for a full-time project manager with accredited architectural degree and 8 years or more of experience preferably in municipal, higher ed, educational and commercial type projects. Architectural licensure in the state of Florida is required for this position. We want someone with management ability to start and finish a project from initial client meeting through closeout and who manages multiple projects at a time. The project manager is responsible for organizing workload, project schedule and lead the Revit/BIM design documents. Strong Revit skills are required."

Technical Architect - Waterproofing details: "The primary responsibility is to provide review of design and construction documents, implementation of QA/QC during construction through review of submittals, RFIs, and review/inspection/testing of ongoing work in the field. The role will include coordination/collaboration with both internal and external team members including Consultants, A/E professionals, Owners, and Contractors for successful completion of all services pertaining to the project(s) assigned."

I Q T seeks an Architectural Services Position in Tampa
"National building survey firm seeks reliable individuals with a background in architecture and an interest in documenting the built environment [building floor, utilities, exterior elevation & roof and section plans/models] in CAD and/or BIM. Full training on our state of the art systems is provided. Must be capable of working independently and be able to perform onsite surveys throughout the U.S. A degree in architecture is required, as is knowledge of and experience with AutoCAD and/or Revit.

If you don't already, follow Archinect on Instagram, Facebook, X, Pinterest, LinkedIn, Threads, and BlueSky, as well as on our dedicated Archinect Jobs Instagram, Facebook, X, and Threads feeds.
